attributes.action: Status for Overstayers here over 10 years to work in sector with worker shortage
attributes.additional_details:
We would like for the government to do this to help struggling businesses be able to recruit in the Uk. Sponsoring overseas worker comes at a high cost for businesses and this will provide quick and easy access to more staff in the Uk. Those people can be productive members of the society. overstayers successful in the visa application can contribute to the growth of the economy by paying taxes and spending within the uk. 
Visa provision should be on the basis of no access to public funds.
attributes.background:
For the government to provide a route for overstayers who have been in the Uk for over 10 years to be regularised and to be productive part of the society. 
Provision of a visa to be with restricted work so they can work in sectors who are currently struggling such as the Care Sector.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624247

If you want undocumented migrants who have been in the UK for 10 years to be able to apply for a particular type of visa, we could accept a petition requesting this, but you would need to be clearer about how want this visa to work.
